---
title: "Grouped Bar Chart"
format: html
editor: visual
---







### Intent

Abstract the flow into three outcomes that matter for interpretation:\
*Retention* (stayed with same side), *Switched* (crossed to the other side), *Drop-off* (did not vote).\
This aligns with the policy question: **turnout vs persuasion**.





::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::





### Why it improves the original

\- Highlights \*\*turnout vs persuasion\*\*, the two key mechanisms in election analysis  

\- Shows \*\*retention, switching, and drop-off\*\* clearly as separate, comparable bars  

\- Removes visual clutter from overlapping flows  

\- Easier to quantify differences between Trump and Biden cohorts
